name: Rotato Rocket
description:
IT'S ROTAT-O-ROCKET! - now available for Android on Google Play

Use left and right arrow keys to guide your space ship through an asteroid field. Or touch left and right side of your screen on mobile.

Collect coins for bonus points and have fun rotating! Try not to hit the asteroids!

Don't forget to type in your name - a global high score board is included so you can compete with everyone! Does that make it multiplayer?

Created for Kenney Jam 2021, theme Rotation.

For more games visit our website gameljne.games or google play.

You can also follow us on Twitter and Facebook :)

NOTES

If you go fullscreen and arrow keys don't seem to work, click into the game and they will. It's an itch.io problem, I dunno.

We always wanted to try some old school faux-3D / MODE7 and this is the first attempt. :)

CREDITS

All graphics and sounds by Kenney - https://kenney.nl/
